welcome.title: Welcome to OVGU
welcome.intro: You just enroll for Magdeburg University? With this app you get an overview of all important information about the life in the university.

steps:
This is the start screen.
Here you can find the latest news.
On the 2nd page there is the calendar so that you don't miss any event!
On the 3rd page is a list of all features.

You often use a feature?
You can tap on the heart to add it to the start screen.

These features appear here on the top.

Campus Map, Mensa und Links are selected by default. You can change it anytime!

features.title: Features
features.info:
You often use a feature?
You can tap on the heart to add it to the start screen.

settings.title: Settings
settings.syncInfo: This app regularly downloads data from the server to keep you up to date. You can use the app offline using the locally stored data.

about.title: About the app
about.main: The Welcome to OVGU app is an initiative of the Otto-von-Guericke University Magdeburg. The goal is to make everyday student life easier - especially for international students.

myEvents.title: My Events
myEvents.info: You can select events which are important to you. These events appear here and under "Next Events" in the home screen.

datePopup.normal: Following events are on this day:
datePopup.empty: There are no events on this day.

eventAddedPopup.title: Event added
eventAddedPopup.content: "$event" has been added to your personal list.

resetPopup.title: Reset Data
resetPopup.content: The app will be reset to the factory settings. Continue?
